author: Special Correspondent
text: There will be no power supply from 9.45 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Saturday in the following areas of the city because of maintenance work to be taken up by Tangedco at the Tiruchi 110 kV and Court sub-stations: Central Bus Stand and Railway Junction areas, Williams Road, Royal Road, Promenade Road, Collector Office Road, Warners Road, Lawsons Road, Reynolds Road, Cantonment, Melapudur, Pudukottai Road Overbridge, Convent Road, Head Post Office, Goodshed Road, Mudaliar Chathram, Bheema Nagar, Heber Road, Uzhavar Sandhai, Pattabiraman Road, Puthur Bharathi Nagar, Government Hospital, Palakkarai, Paruppukara Street, Jamaludheen Makkan, Udayan Thottam, Arunachalam Colony, Peechankulam,Warehouse, Pudutheru, Cooni Bazaar, Marsinghpettai, Puthur Officers Colony, Bishop Heber College area, parts of Khajapettai and Woraiyur, Mettutheru, Walajah Bazaar, Vannarapettai, Vayalur Road - Kumaran Nagar to Rettai Vaical, Ramalinga Nagar, Fathima Nagar, Kuzhumani Road – Nachiyar Kovil to Seerathoppu, Ponnagar, Crawford, Arasu Colony, Rajiv Gandhi Nagar, Dheeran Nagar, Pirattiyur, Somarasampettai, Allithurai, Pallakadu, Vayalur, Vyazhanmedu, Puliyur and Ettarai.
title: Power shutdown 9.45 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Saturday
